name: Thorny Buckler [2]

name: Ticket of Ferris Wheel
description: With this ticket you can visit the dream Ferris wheel in Geffen. An item preferred by couples in love. (can only invite the opposite sex.)

name: Tickle Bar
description: Freeze! Stop running! (Use it on another player to halt their current action and make them laugh with you. )
